scripts.start: npm run kill-ports && concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.dev: npm run kill-ports && concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.backend: cd backend && cross-env PORT=5001 npm start
scripts.frontend: cd frontend && cross-env PORT=3000 npm start
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
